sourcesContent:
<template>
   <el-form :model="form" label-width="100px">
     <el-row :gutter="20">
       <el-col :span="8">
         <el-form-item label="项目编号" prop="projectCode">
           <el-input v-model="form.projectCode" placeholder="请输入项目编号" clearable suffix-icon="el-icon-circle-check"/>
         </el-form-item>
       </el-col>
       <el-col :span="8" style="display: flex; align-items: center;">
         <el-button type="success" icon="el-icon-check">获取</el-button>
       </el-col>
       <el-col :span="8">
         <el-form-item label="项目名称" prop="projectName">
           <el-input v-model="form.projectName" placeholder="请输入项目名称" clearable suffix-icon="el-icon-circle-check"/>
         </el-form-item>
       </el-col>
      
     </el-row>
     <el-row :gutter="20" style="display: flex; align-items: flex-end;">
       <el-col :span="8">
         <el-form-item label="项目总预算" prop="projectBudget">
           <el-input-number v-model="form.projectBudget" placeholder="请输入项目总预算" step="1000" :controls="false" min="0"/>
         </el-form-item>
       </el-col>
       <el-col :span="8">
         <el-form-item label="币种" prop="currency">
           <el-select v-model="form.currency" placeholder="请选择币种">
             <el-option label="人民币" value="CNY"/>
             <el-option label="美元" value="USD"/>
             <el-option label="欧元" value="EUR"/>
           </el-select>
         </el-form-item>
       </el-col>
       <el-col :span="8">
         <el-form-item label=" " style="margin-bottom: 0;">
           <el-input v-model="form.projectBudgetText" :rows="2" placeholder="请输入项目总预算（文字）" type="textarea"/>
         </el-form-item>
       </el-col>
     </el-row>
   </el-form>
 </template>
 
 <script>
 export default {
   data() {
     return {
       form: {
         projectCode: '',
         projectName: '',
         projectBudget: '',
         currency: '',
         projectBudgetText: '',
       },
     };
   },
 };
 </script>
